#include<iostream>
#include<string>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
   string s;
   int t,c,i,j,d,e,f;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
   cin>>c;
   cin>>s;
   d=c*2;
   e=d-1;
   f=e;
   c=c-1;
   for(i=0;i<=c;)
   {
       for(j=i;j<s.size();)
       {
           cout<<s[j];
           if(e<=s.size()&&f>c)
            cout<<s[e];
            j=j+d;
            e=e+d;
       }
       i=i+1;
       e=--f;
   }
   cout<<endl;
   }
   //system("pause");
   return 0;
}
